ack.p: We are thankful to the Director, CSIR-CIMAP, Lucknow, India for rendering essential research facilities and support. YK, OP, and HT acknowledge the UGC, CSIR, and ICMR, New Delhi, India for the fellowship support through SRF (RGNF; UGC), PA-III (BSC-0121; GENESIS), and SRF (ICMR), respectively. We also acknowledge the CSIR, New Delhi, India for financial support to the Bioinformatics lab through networking project BSC-0121 (GENESIS). We also acknowledge the team ICT Division, CSIR-CIMAP, Lucknow for constant IT support. The CIMAP communication number is CIMAP/PUB/2015/13. We acknowledge the Bito Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Lucknow for database web interface development.
